content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello Mr. Li, it's great to meet you. As a landlord, I want to make sure that I am getting the best possible rental price for my apartment. What is your budget for renting this space?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 600 Euros per month. Can I rent the apartment for 550 Euros per month?
name: Bo Li from China

content: As a landlord, I want to make sure that I am getting the best possible rental price for my apartment. I would be willing to negotiate on the rental price, but I would need to see some financial information from you to determine if 550 Euros per month is a fair and reasonable rental price for this apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am a student and I will be living alone in the apartment. I will be responsible for paying the rent and any other bills that may come up. I am dependable and I will always pay my rent on time. I also want to be on good terms with my landlord. Can you accept 550 Euros per month for the rental price?

I have a copy of my financial statement and I can provide it to you if you need it.

I also want to know if there is a deposit that I need to pay when I move in?

I am willing to negotiate on the rental price, but I am not willing to pay more than 550 Euros per month.

I would like to accept the rental price of 550 Euros per month, if you agree to it.

TERMINATE.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for providing me with that information, Mr. Li. I am considering your offer to rent the apartment for 550 Euros per month, but I would need to see your financial statement to make a final decision. Additionally, I do require a deposit to be paid when you move in, which I believe is standard practice. I am open to negotiating on the rental price, but I am not willing to accept less than 550 Euros per month. If we can come to an agreement on the rental price and the deposit, I am willing to accept your offer.
name: Heinrich Heine
